LanguageData.Mech_ArmoTank_arailgun.label: Snow field tank
LanguageData.Mech_ArmoTank_arailgun.description: A tank mechanoid that was active in the cold snowfields. Hard as a tank, it fires cannons, and fires its line-rail firearms to block oncoming enemies.
